price: 66. Sidaasay uga abaal dhacaan waxaanu siinnay, sidaas darteed ha iska raaxeysteen 12, wayse ogaan doonaan (cidhibteeda).
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: 12. Waxaa sidoo kale Aayadda loo fasiri karaa gooddin ahaan: “Ee ha ka abaal dhacaan waxa aanu siinnay oo ha iska raaxeystaan, wayse ogaan doonaan waxa ku dhaca.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum waliyatamattaʿū fasawfa yaʿlamūna
